download.title: Scratch 2.0 Pūmanawa Whakatika Tuimotu
download.intro: Ka tāuta koe i te pūmanawa whakatika o Scratch 2.0 hei whakamahi i ngā kaupapa, i ngā wā, kāhore kau he hononga ipurangi.  Ka mahi hoki tēnei whakaaturanga ki runga ki te Mac, ki te Windows, ki ētahi whakaaturanga hoki o Linux (32 bit).
download.introMac: Note for Mac Users: the latest version of Scratch 2.0 Offline requires Adobe AIR 20. To upgrade to Adobe AIR 20 manually, go here.
download.airBody: Mēnā kaore i a koe, tango iho, tāuta hoki te mea hou rawa Adobe AIR
download.macOlder: Maki OS 10.5 me ngā mea tawhito
download.offlineEditorBody: He tangoihotanga ake, ā, ka tāuta te Scratch 2.0 Pūmanawa Whakatika Tuimotu
download.supportMaterialsBody: E hiaāwhina ana ki te tīmata? Anei ētehi rauemi hei āwhina.
download.updatesBody: Ka whakahou te Pūmanawa Whakatika i a ia anō (ki te whakaaetanga o te kaiwhakamahi).  Ka kimi ia i ngā whakahoutanga i te whakaoho, nā, ka whakamahi koe rānei i te "Kimihia ngā whakahoutanga" whakahautanga i te tahua kōnae.
download.otherVersionsTitle: Ko ētehi Whakaaturanga atu o Scratch
download.otherVersionsOlder: Mēnā he rorohiko tawhito tāhau, tē taea rānei te tāuta te pūmanawa whakatika tuimotu Scratch 2.0, ka whakamātau koe ki te tāuta Scratch 1.4.
download.otherVersionsAdmin: Mēnā he kaiwhakahaere whatunga: kua hangaia, kua tuarātia tētehi Scratch 2.0 MSI e tētehi o ngā mema o te hāpori, ā, kua mau hoki ia kia tangohia iho e te marea mai i kōnei.
download.knownIssuesOne: If your offline editor is crashing directly after Scratch is opened, install the Scratch 2 offline editor again (see step 2 above). This issue is due to a bug introduced in Adobe AIR version 14 (released April 2014).
download.knownIssuesTwo: Kei whakapōturi ngā pōraka whakairoiro pānga (i roto i "Tirohanga") i ngā haupapa, ko tētehi ngārara Flash e mōhio ana.
download.knownIssuesThree: Kaore anō te pīkau e rite ana.
download.knownIssuesFour: On Mac OS you may see a prompt indicating that "Scratch 2 is trying to install a new helper tool" and asking for your user name and password. We are currently investigating a solution to this problem.
download.reportBugs: Tukua pūrongo mō ngā Ngārara me ngā Hapa
download.notAvailable: A, kaore anō kia rite ngā tangoihotanga kaiwhakatika ināianei - tēnā koa, whakahoungia te whārangi kia whakamātau anō.
